meanings.definition: A hard, translucent fossil resin that is yellowish to reddish-brown in color.
meanings.sent1: The necklace was made of shiny amber.
meanings.sent2: The sunlight glinted off the amber gem.
meanings.sent3: She mistook the amber resin for delicious candy.
meanings.sent4: His eyes held an amber glow of determination.
meanings.sent5: The amber fossil seemed to hold secrets of ancient times.

meanings.definition: A yellowish-orange color resembling that of amber.
meanings.sent1: The painting featured warm tones of amber.
meanings.sent2: Her dress shimmered in a lovely amber hue.
meanings.sent3: The sunset painted the sky in shades of amber and gold.
meanings.sent4: The room glowed with the soft light of amber lamps.
meanings.sent5: The autumn leaves turned a beautiful shade of amber.

meanings.sent1: The leaves will slowly amber as fall approaches.
meanings.sent2: The sky began to amber as the sun set.
meanings.sent4: The horizon ambered with the promise of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The water ambered under the evening light.
